items.title: 13'' MacBook Pro, 3.1ghz dual-core i7, 16GB of RAM, Intel Iris 5100 (2014)
items.description: Prior to this I was using a 2015 5K iMac as my main machine and a 2014 13 MacBook Pro for travel. This machine is more powerful than my iMac and feels just as portable as my 13 did — really love this computer.
